text: Jonathan Michael Gledhill (14 February 1949 â€“ 1 November 2021) was an English Anglican clergyman. He was the Bishop of Southampton from 1996 to 2003, and the Bishop of Lichfield from 2003 to 2015. He was born in Windsor, Berkshire, England. He announced he had Parkinson's disease, shortly before his retirement from ministry in 2015. Gledhill died on 1 November 2021, at the age of 72.Tributes paid to Bishop Jonathan ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Church of England bishops Category:People from Berkshire
title: Jonathan Gledhill
